alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 8:18AM CST until March 01 at 6:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Snow Today... .Increased snowfall reaching central Wisconsin late this morning with snowfall rates up to 1 inch per hour. A few inches of accumulation look likely. These heavier snowfall rates may linger into the afternoon hours, primarily for northern half of Taylor county. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches possible. * WHERE...Taylor County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
